rules.description: Substitute TMUX prefix with VK4 on iTerm2
[iTerm2] VK1+O -> Ctrl+T Ctrl+P / VK1+P -> Ctrl+T Ctrl+N
[iTerm2] VK2+A -> Ctrl+T Ctrl+P / VK2+S -> Ctrl+T Ctrl+N
[GoogleChrome] VK4+N -> Cmd+Shift+M,Enter (Switch to the other user)
VK1+S -> Shift+Ctrl+J / VK1+D -> Shift+Ctrl+Semicolon (IME Switching of Google Japanese Input)
VK1+Y -> Cmd+C / VK1+T -> Cmd+X / VK1+X -> Cmd+Shift+V
VK1+B -> Ctrl+Opt+Cmd+Shift+M (Maximize window size with ShiftIt)
